## About me

<br>
I am a bioinformatician, with a background in statistics and agronomy.

I am currently a PhD student in [GenScale team](https://team.inria.fr/genscale/) (INRIA/IRISA) and [EGI team](https://www6.rennes.inra.fr/igepp/Equipes-de-recherche/Ecologie-et-Genetique-des-Insectes) (INRA Igepp) in Rennes, France.

My PhD aims are the strain level caracterization of the pea aphid symbionts, and the development of new tools for targetted metagenomic assembly
